messages.subject: Books...Jackie
messages.msgSnippet: I was at the library today and the children s librarian suggested... The House With a Clock in its Walls by John Bellairs.... Half Magic by (last name)
messages.messageBody:
I was at the library today and the children's
librarian suggested..."The House With a Clock in its
Walls" by John Bellairs.... "Half Magic" by (last
name) Eager (only a guess on the spelling).... "Tom's
Midnight Garden" by Pearce Also she ask being that
the Harry Potter characters parents die violently how
your daughter handled this? Did you read to her and
leave this part out? Because she told me of the book
"A Winkle In Time" which was the first book she
recommended but she did mention the dad disappearing
(but he does come back!) Thats when she asked about
the parents in Harry Potter and how you handled that.
She said if your DD read HP she should like and enjoy
"a Wrinkle in Time" Did you ever read "a Walk in Wolf
Wood"?
Good luck and Happy Reading!
Jill
